text: Paul Montgomery Shore (born February 1, 1968) is an American actor, comedian and movie director. He's best known for his roles in several comedy movies in the 1990s. == Filmography == * A Goofy Movie (1995) * Casper: A Spirited Beginning (1997) * Casper Meets Wendy (1998) * An Extremely Goofy Movie (2000) == References == == Other websites == * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish American comedians Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Comedians from Los Angeles Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles
title: Pauly Shore
